entry.title: SPECIAL WEATHER STATEMENT , Escoumins
entry.summary: Persons in or near this area should be on the lookout for adverse weather conditions and take necessary safety precautions. Issued: 04:56 AM EST Tuesday 24 January 2023

entry.title: Tuesday: Chance of flurries. High minus 3. POP 60%
entry.summary: Mainly cloudy. 60 percent chance of flurries this afternoon. Wind becoming northwest 30 km/h gusting to 50 near noon. High minus 3. Wind chill near minus 12. UV index 1 or low. Forecast issued 05:00 AM EST Tuesday 24 January 2023

entry.title: Tuesday night: Partly cloudy. Low minus 17.
entry.summary: Clearing this evening. Wind northwest 30 km/h gusting to 50. Low minus 17. Wind chill minus 12 this evening and minus 27 overnight. Forecast issued 05:00 AM EST Tuesday 24 January 2023

entry.title: Wednesday: Sunny. High minus 13.
entry.summary: Sunny. Wind northwest 20 km/h becoming light near noon. High minus 13. Wind chill minus 27 in the morning and minus 16 in the afternoon. UV index 1 or low. Forecast issued 05:00 AM EST Tuesday 24 January 2023

entry.title: Wednesday night: Periods of snow. Low minus 13.
entry.summary: Periods of snow. Low minus 13. Forecast issued 05:00 AM EST Tuesday 24 January 2023

entry.title: Thursday: Snow and blowing snow. High minus 4.
entry.summary: Snow. Blowing snow. Windy. High minus 4. Forecast issued 05:00 AM EST Tuesday 24 January 2023

entry.title: Thursday night: Cloudy. Low minus 12.
entry.summary: Cloudy. Low minus 12. Forecast issued 05:00 AM EST Tuesday 24 January 2023

entry.summary: Sunny. High minus 9. Forecast issued 05:00 AM EST Tuesday 24 January 2023

entry.title: Friday night: Clear. Low minus 14.
entry.summary: Clear. Low minus 14. Forecast issued 05:00 AM EST Tuesday 24 January 2023
